problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, P is a point in the parallelogram ABCD, and cross point P to draw the parallel line of AB and AD to intersect the parallelogram at the four points of E, F, G, and H. If S~AHPE~ = N_0, S~PFCG~ = N_1 , Then S~△PBD~ is ()
raw_answer: 解:显然EPGD、GPFC、EPHA、PHBF均为平行四边形,∴S~△DEP~=S~△DGP~=\frac{1}{2}S~平行四边形DEPG~,∴S~△PHB~=S~△PBF~=\frac{1}{2}S~平行四边形PHBF~,又S~△ADB~=S~△EPD~+S~平行四边形AHPE~+S~△PHB~+S~△PDB~①S~△BCD~=S~△PDG~+S~平行四边形PFCG~+S~△PFB~-S~△PDB~②①-②得0=S~平行四边形AHPE~-S~平行四边形PFCG~+2S~△PDB~,即2S~△PBD~=5-3=2∴S~△PBD~=1．故选:B．
